# Max Int32

> Maximum [signed 32-bit integer][max-int32].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var INT32_MAX = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/int32-max' );
```

#### INT32_MAX

Maximum [signed 32-bit integer][max-int32].

```javascript
var bool = ( INT32_MAX === 2147483647 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

```javascript
var INT32_MAX = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/int32-max' );

console.log( INT32_MAX );
// => 2147483647
```

</section>
